ORDINANCE COMMITTEE
COMMITTTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Wednesday, April 14, 2021

5:30 PM

Sullivan Chamber

The Ordinance Committee will conduct a public hearing on the Retail Uses Zoning
Recommendations - Refiled (Ordinance #2021-3) and the Home Occupations Zoning
Recommendations - Refiled (Ordinance #2021-4)
